JOB DESCRIPTION:
Job Title: Junior Executive Software Development 

Summary: 

Yalamanchili is seeking to hire a skilled Java Developers who are proficient with 

coding in Java. Their primary responsibilities include designing and implementing 

java applications ,  developing and testing software and resolving technical issues 

Job responsibilities: 

Develop code using JAVA Language. 

Refine the code based on the specification and the technical needs. 

Developing and integrating the system as a whole. 

Implement optimized and high quality modules. 

Support the team in maintaining code quality. 

Required Skills: 

A BE/ B.Sc graduate with Computer science background is preferred. 

0 - 2 years of Experience can be considered. 

Good in communication & attitude. 

Self - motivated smart worker. 

Good self  -  learning skills. 

Should have knowledge in HTML - CSS ,  Bootstrap. 

Certification in JAVA ,  JS - CS ,  and Core JAVA will be an added advantage.
